name: Ventas y Utilidad por vendedor USD
query:
select
d.agente as "Vendedor::180",
SUM(b.qty) as "Cantidad Articulos::140", 
SUM(@Importe := case when d.currency = 'USD' then b.amount * d.conversion_rate else b.amount end) as "Importe Ventas:Float:150", 
sum(@ImporteCosto := (b.last_purchase_rate)*(b.qty)) as "Importe Costo:Float:140",
SUM(@Utilidad := (case when d.currency = 'USD' then b.amount * d.conversion_rate else b.amount end)- (@ImporteCosto)) AS "Utilidad:Float:140",
@Porcentaje := null AS "Porcentaje::140"

from
`tabSales Invoice Item` b left join
`tabItem` c on b.item_code = c.item_code left join
`tabSales Invoice` d on b.parent = d.name left join
`tabvariables` e on d.name = e.parent
where d.docstatus = 1 and d.posting_date >= %(d.from_date)s and d.posting_date <= %(d.to_date)s and b.qty >= '0' and d.currency = 'USD'
GROUP BY d.agente desc
report_name: Ventas y Utilidad por vendedor USD
